channel.title: RSC at school?
channel.description: I've tried a bunch of servers with webclients as well as normal clients, but none work. I think the school blocks connections and closes all ports, but is therea way to get around that? When I'm done my assignments I never have anything to do :I

item.title: RSC at school?
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

Not really a needed topic here.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC at school?
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

If you really want to play RSC at school, download it from home. Take it in on a USB and start playing once you get there. You can try different games as well, warcraft 3, halo, world of warcraft all of these work for me and the filter my school uses is quite tight. But the only port they filter is most likely only “80”. Try it out though.

Read full topic

Better yet, focus on school.

item.title: RSC at school?
item.dc:creator: @Peeter_Griffin Peeter Griffin
item.description:
@Peeter_Griffin wrote:

zj93:

here i will help u out so much ok when u get too school click start the click run and type (cmd) and then type (trace ip) then type the website suggjestion (www.moparscape.com) like that and then at the bottom after everything loads it should have a number thing at the bottom like (98.254.222.143) or something like that then just type that in your address bar!

OMG YOUR A GENIUS! What in the world would that number thing at the bottom be???

item.title: RSC at school?
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

Pork, I used the same thing =p.

You can try a Proxy made by Keith, (Anc13nts), proxy.codingplus.net, I also used that before I was kicked off the school computers.

OR, you can do this…

Open windows media player Go to Media Guide Go to the games tab on the window and click downloads then click DL the Windows Media Player 11 Get to the ms page and then type Google and click web search get to the Google page and surf it up

GL =p.

-Kozy

Read full topic
